name: UINib
desc: An object that contains Interface Builder nib files.

items.name: init(nibName: String, bundle: Bundle?)
items.desc: Returns a nib object from the nib file in the specified bundle.

items.name: init(data: Data, bundle: Bundle?)
items.desc: Creates a nib object from nib data stored in memory.

items.name: func instantiate(withOwner: Any?, options: [UINib.OptionsKey : Any]?) -> [Any]
items.desc: Unarchives and instantiates the in-memory contents of the nib objectâ€™s nib file, creating a distinct object tree and set of top-level objects.

items.name: struct UINib.OptionsKey
items.desc: Options that specify how to unarchive and instantiate the nib.
